CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Security_Amount__c )),"*** Security is required in the amount of $" + TEXT(Security_Amount__c) + " and can be provided in the form of a cash deposit, letter of credit, surety bond, or prepayment. Prepayment requires John Wacker's approval. ***", TEXT(Credit_Request_Status__c))
CustomField.label: Security Required Message
